entry.title: Updating Octopress Theme
entry.content:
The themes are stored in `.themes/<name>`, we can use the rake command to update either the source or style, as documented in the [office website](http://octopress.org/docs/updating/). However, the syntax should be more clear, i.e.,
``` rake update_source['theme name'] ```
Without the brackets, it defaults to `.themes/classic`.
